articles.title: US hopeful of Gaza ceasefire and hostage deal in 'coming days' - Financial Times
articles.description: National security adviser Jake Sullivan says negotiators in Paris reached ‘understanding’ on basics of agreement
articles.content: US national security adviser Jake Sullivan said on Sunday he hoped a firm and final agreement on a temporary Gaza ceasefire and the release of hostages could be reached in the coming days, after prog… [+4654 chars]

articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: The Xiaomi 14 and 14 Ultra will be available globally - The Verge
articles.description: Xiaomi’s 14 and 14 Ultra are debuting for the first time outside of China. The 14 Ultra continues to emphasize camera features with an extra telephoto lens.
articles.content:
